name: Swiffer Wizard Interdimensional Realtor
description:
Swiffer Wizard: Interdimensional Realtor, a game about, cleaning? But also about getting a high score and rollin' in virtual CASH!  Clear the demons from the house, but you only have a short amount of time before it gets put up for sale!

Controls: 
Arrows / WASD : Move
Z - Swiffer (A)
X - Unused (B)
Enter - Unused (Start)
Shift - Unused (Select)

Current Version 1.0
Bugs: Currently there is a bug where some random demons will not be interactable. I'm very sorry and will look into fixing the problem. If you encounter the bug please ignore it and move on.

Swiffer Wizard: Interdimensional Realtor was made for the PIGSquad 2021 June Summer Slow Jam ft. themes: Exploration; Forgotten Places.

Created using GB Studio 2.0

Some assets borrowed from the Sample project as well as the community assets available here https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets
